thread.section_title: eTeacherBiblical Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of eTeacherBiblical | eteacherbiblical.com
thread.title: Beatrice Nation

author: Beatrice Nation
title: Beatrice Nation
text: i learn so much in a very short time frame. I love the fact that the instructor calls on each of us participate in the exercises thus ensuring that we understand the lesson. It's really one-on-one teaching. I look forward to class each week. In addition to learning the language, our instructor Yehuda, from time to time imparts such valuable knowledge of Jewish culture. It really is amazing. We feel blessed. Having the e-manual is a great help in preparing for the class or going over the grammar points.
